org.jetel.graph

Class JobflowEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.GraphElement
      • org.jetel.graph.Edge
        • org.jetel.graph.JobflowEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphElement, InputPort, InputPortDirect, OutputPort, OutputPortDirect

    public class JobflowEdge
extends Edge
    This edge implementation is used in case the graph is running with jobflow GraphNature.
    See Also:
    EdgeFactory
